data.title: Distance from Leon to Salamanca
data.meta_description: Distance between Leon and Salamanca is 80 kilometers (49 miles) in Mexico. Also calculate the driving distance and how far is it the travel time.
data.text:
How far is it between Le√≥n and Salamanca

Leon is located in Mexico with (21.1305,-101.671) coordinates and Salamanca is located in Mexico with (20.572,-101.1915) coordinates. The calculated flying distance from Leon to Salamanca is equal to 49 miles which is equal to 80 km.

If you want to go by car, the driving distance between Leon and Salamanca is 92.55 km. If you ride your car with an average speed of 112 kilometers/hour (70 miles/h), travel time will be 00 hours 49 minutes. Please check the avg. speed travel time table on the right for various options.

Difference between fly and go by a car is 13 km.
